components.xhtml:
### Page flow view

A flow diagram of how your service's pages link together.

- [Page flow view](/admin/flow)

### Pages

The pages in your service. Click a link to edit that page.

Pages that are steps of another page are shown as nested bullets.

{pages}

### Configuration

Edit details for your service, such as its name and phase (alpha, beta etc).

- [Service](/admin/instance/service)
components.htmlOverspill:
Click on the links below to edit your pages and service details.



To create a new page, click [enter text].
